STATE OF MICHIGAN
GRETCHEN WHITMER DEPARTMENT OF LICENSING AND REGULATORY AFFAIRS Robert Gordon
GOVERNOR LANSING DIRECTOR
August 12, 2019
Brandon Genwright
Saginaw County Detention Home
3360 Hospital Road
Saginaw, MI 48603
RE: License #: CO730201394
Saginaw County Detention Home
3360 Hospital Road
Saginaw, MI 48603
Dear Mr. Genwright:
This letter is a follow-up to the Department’s findings regarding the interim inspection
conducted at your facility on 08/06/2019. The purpose of this inspection was to determine
compliance with applicable licensing statutes and administrative rules for Court Operated
Residential Care Facility.
The violations that were found are:
The agency was found in compliance with all administrative rules and applicable
statutes.
Please contact me with any questions.
Sincerely,
James B. Gale, Licensing Consultant
MDHHS\Division of Child Welfare Licensing
4th Floor, Suite 4B
51111 Woodward Avenue
Pontiac, MI 48342
611 W. OTTAWA  P.O. BOX 30664  LANSING, MICHIGAN 48909
www.michigan.gov/lara  517-335-1980
